actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill for the relief of LeRoy Sylestine, Chairman of the Tribal Council of the Coushatta Tribe of Louisiana, and all other enrolled members of the Coushatta Tribe of Louisiana.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to an Indian tribe in Louisiana representing a settlement between the tribe and the United States regarding the uncompensated taking by the United States of land owned or occupied by the tribe in the 19th century.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of LeRoy Sylestine, Chairman of the Tribal Council of the Coushatta Tribe of Louisiana, and all other enrolled members of the Coushatta Tribe of Louisiana.
